Performance Verification¶

class design.performance.Performance(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This class calculates the end performance of the UAV created in the KBE GUI. This verifies that the UAV will fulfill the mission requirements.

Parameters:wing_in (Wing) – The Wing input instantiation.
cruise_velocity[source]¶

Computes the optimum cruise velocity utilizing the maximum tangent between velocity axis and the power required curves. If this value is too close to the stall speed (which is determined by the input ‘stall_buffer’, then the non-optimum but safe value is returned instead.

Returns:Optimum cruise velocity in SI meter per second [m/s]
Return type:float
endurance_velocity[source]¶

Computes the optimum endurance velocity utilizing the maximum positive difference between the power available and required curves. If this value is too close to the stall speed (which is determined by the input ‘stall_buffer’, then the non-optimum but safe value is returned instead.

Returns:Optimum endurance velocity in SI meter per second [m/s]
Return type:float
eta_curve_bounds[source]¶

Defines the bounds of the propeller curve to not address values that are not covered by the propeller data index 0 refers to the minimum velocity and index 1 refers to the maximum velocity

Return type:list
maximum_velocity[source]¶

Computes the maximum flight velocity utilizing the burst-power curve of the motor.

Returns:Maximum velocity in SI meter per second [m/s]
Return type:float
power_available[source]¶

Grabs the available shaft power of the engine from the provided motor. Index 0 refers to continuous power and Index 1 refers to the burst power of the engine

Return type:list
power_spline[source]¶

Creates a linear-spline of the power required curve to be able to call any velocity value.

Return type:interp1d
prop_speed_range[source]¶

Defines the True Airspeed (TAS) range used for the analysis through use of the minimum and maximum values available in propeller data so as to not force data extrapolation.

Returns:Range of True Airspeeds (TAS) in SI meter per second [m/s]
Return type:numpy array
propeller_eta_curve[source]¶

Fetches the propeller efficiency curve as a function of airspeed from the provided propeller

Return type:interpld
stall_speed[source]¶

Computes the new stall speed caused by change in MTOW in Class II (bottoms-up) as compared to the initial estimate from Class I

Returns:Stall Speed in SI meter per second [m/s]
Return type:float
